name: Path T
title: Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  TNM does not include a Tis or TX category for melanoma of mucosa of head and neck sites. Tis and TX are mapped to NA and TNM stage group is derived as NA.

**Note 2:**  TNM does not include a T1 or T2 category for mucosal melanoma of head and neck sites.

**Note 3:**  Assign T3 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available.
rows:
In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa 
(mucosal disease)

Tumor confined to mucosa of upper lip:
    Labial mucosa (inner lip)
    Vermilion surface

Extension involving mucosa only:
   Commissure
   Floor of mouth
   Gingiva (lower, upper and NOS)
   Inner cheek (buccal mucosa)
   Opposite lip (both lips)
   Tongue

Localized, NOS

Stated as T3

Tumor invades deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone
or overlying skin

Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature of upper lip
Soft tissue NOS
Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature of upper lip plus mucosal involvement of any structure in T3
Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature of any structure in T3
Involvement of deep tissue or periosteum of upper gingiva
Involvement of deep tissue or musculature of floor of mouth or tongue

Bone, NOS except base of skull
Cartilage, NOS
Cartilage of mandible
Cartilage of maxilla
Cortical bone, NOS
Cortical bone of mandible
Cortical bone of maxilla
Deep tissue or periosteum of lower gingiva
Inferior alveolar nerve
Mandible, NOS
Maxilla, NOS
Skin of face/neck
Skin of nose
Skin of nose plus mucosa or deep tissue lower gingiva

Extrinsic muscle of tongue:
    Genioglossus
    Hyoglossus
    Palatoglossus
    Styloglossus

Stated as T4a

Tumor invades any of the following:
Brain
Dura
Skull base
Lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII)
Masticator space
Carotid artery
Prevertebral space
Mediastinal structures

Contiguous extension:
    Base of skull
    Carotid artery (encased)
    Pterygoid plates

Stated as T4b
